h2_title: Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast
Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast is a secret Yaoguai King boss hidden in Chapter 5 of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. You can find this ferocious beast at the end of the hidden area, with its two types of elemental attacks making it a difficult fight.
## Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast Boss Fight and Guide

The fight will begin immediately as the beast launches itself at you. It's extremely agile, and a lot of the fight will be the beast hurtling towards you, trying to take swipes at you. Despite this agility, you'll see familiar moves to other bosses you've encountered in this Chapter so far.

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic moment from the boss fight against the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast in the game Black Myth: Wukong. The scene captures the ferocious beast, characterized by its fiery appearance, as it charges towards the player character in a dark, cavernous setting. This encounter is part of a secret challenge in Chapter 5, where players must navigate the beast's agile and elemental attacks. The image serves as a visual representation of the intense and challenging nature of this boss fight, emphasizing the beast's aggressive movements and the player's defensive stance.
